channel.title: How do i change what the inside of the game says
channel.description: like inhte txt box it say s vot at ........ and i want it to say my webbsite name and vote here....also i want it to say welcome to mickster scape!!

item.title: How do i change what the inside of the game says
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:361365”][quote author=itai link=topic=457644.msg3349176#msg3349176 date=1285109885]
Posts like this make me wonder why people like you release servers before you can do shit.
[/quote]
Its not like you’re born omniscient, why would someone automatically know where to find the login message? Its not like there’s a LoginMessageFoundHere class

And like Keatrm said, it should be client class.

It doens’t have to be in the Client class, varies widely depending on the source you use.
In other sources/revisions you can find the login message in places such as:
authentication.py
RSLoginProtocol class
Login class
etc…[/quote]
Ok, well I should have asked protocol.
But you can still search your whole damn source and find the message in there some where.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change what the inside of the game says

Deathchaos,
lets be real here
Do you really think his welcome message isn’t in client.java?
I mean really?
[/quote]

No I don’t think that at all, I have absolutely no idea what source he has, and therefore I have no idea where the welcome message might be.

@Scape-JAVA
If he’s using delta doesn’t he have to have

sM("For the forum go to www.yourforumsurlhere.com");

Who says its a Delta base? :|[/quote]

Was just an example

item.title: How do i change what the inside of the game says
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:3, topic:361365”]Posts like this make me wonder why people like you release servers before you can do shit.
And like Keatrm said, it should be client class.[/quote]

Honestly shut up.

@OP
In your client.java (fixt) (commonly referred to as client class) you should search for “Welcome to”, it should then bring you to the welcome message, change it to whatever you wish. To get your website url add an extra message like the example below:

sendMessage("For the forum go to www.yourforumsurlhere.com");
etc…

@Deathchaos
He is right, it can be in different classes not always in the client class (although it usually is :p), but it’s different for other revisions such as 474, 508, 562, etc. (Most of you know that anyway).

Read full topic
